description: helpception
options: `command` - The command you want to lookup.

description: Shows your current inventory including items, health, level, xp, and money.
usage: inv <@user/discord#tag>` - Shows inventory of specified user.
options: `@user/discord#tag` - User to check inventory of.

description: Use an item on yourself or attack another user with a weapon.
cooldown: Depends on the item used, check with the `item` command
usage: use <item>` - Uses an item on yourself, such as healing items or boxes
use <item> <@user/random>` - Attack user with an item or weapon.
options:
`item` - Item to use
`@user` or `random` - User to attack, will be random if you specifiy random.

description:
Use components from `recycling` to craft items such as:
`rail_cannon`
`ray_gun`
`ultra_box`
options:
`item` - Item to craft.
`amount` - **OPTIONAL** Amount of items to craft.

description: Recycle `legendary` quality items for components.
options:
`item` - Item of atleast `legendary` quality.
`amount` - **OPTIONAL** Amount of item to recycle.

description: Specify an item to see detailed information about it.
usage: items` - Shows a list of all items.
options: `item` - Item to search.

description: Purchase items with currency. Check the `shop` to see what can be bought.
options:
`item` - Item to buy.
`amount` - **OPTIONAL** Amount of item to purchase.

description: Sell all items of a certain rarity. If no rarity is specified, it will sell all items in your inventory.
options: `rarity` - **OPTIONAL** Rarity of items you want to sell ie. common, rare...

description: Sell items for money. Check the `shop` to see how much items can be sold for.
options:
`item` - Item to sell.
`amount` - **OPTIONAL** Amount of item to sell.

description: Show the market of all items that can be bought or sold. Occasionally, steam keys may be displayed for sale on the home page.

Start a trade with another user. Trade commands include:

`add <item> <amount>` - Item to add to trade
`remove <item>` - Remove item from trade
`addmoney <amount>` - Amount of money to add
`accept`
`cancel`
options: `@user` - Mention user to trade with.

description: Answer a random trivia question for a reward! Rewards range from item_boxes to ammo_boxes.
Unscramble a random word for a reward! Rewards vary depending on difficulty you choose, and the difficulty of the word.
options: `difficulty` - easy OR hard

description: Use this command to receive a free item_box every hour.
Gamble an amount of money. Ways to gamble include slots, roulette, or coinflip.
options:
`type` - slots, roulette, or coinflip
`amount` - Amount of money to gamble

description: Vote for the bot to receive a reward.
Deactivates your account on server it's used in. Deactivating prevents you from being attacked in that server **BUT** also prevents you from being able to use commands.

Displays your level along with your current scaled damage.
Below is a table of stats for each level.
Displays your current xp/points.
Displays your current health and your maximum possible health.
Displays your current amount of money.
Displays a list of all active users on the server.
Displays information about the current update and the bot.
Displays cooldowns for all commands and time remaining on your shield if you have one active.
Displays a leaderboard of all players with the highest level and amount of money.
options: `s` - **OPTIONAL** Will show leaderboard for server

description: Deletes your account. This action can **NOT** be undone. You can only delete once every few hours.
Sends a link to the official Lootcord Discord Server!
Allows user to spend skill points for upgrading attributes. Attributes include Vitality, Strength, and Luck.
options: `skill` - **OPTIONAL** Will upgrade selected skill when command is called, without menu.

description: Displays a users profile. Shows their stats, currently equipped items and their status.
options: `@user/discord#tag` - User's profile to check.
`amount` - Amount of money to gamble.

description:
Play a game of Russian roulette.
If you survive, you win **1.2x** what you bet.
If you lose, you'll be shot for **50** damage and lose your bet amount.
options: `amount` - Amount of money to gamble.

description: Gamble your money for a 50% chance of winning 2x what you bet!
options: `amount` - Amount of money to gamble.

description: Displays official Lootcord rules.
Shows currently equipped backpack and current inventory space.
Allows user to equip different backpacks, armor, and inventory banners.
options: `item` - Item to equip.

description: Unequip your current backback, armor, or banner. Can also unequip your shield, but will give you an hour attack cooldown for doing so.
options:
`item` - Item to equip.
backpack - Will unequip backpack if you have one equipped.

description:
Command used to change the prefix for the server.
User **MUST** have the Manage Server permission.
options: `prefix` - Input to change server prefix to. Must be 1-3 characters long.

description:
Toggle the current channel as the kill feed channel, will log all kills from the server in that channel.
User **MUST** have the Manage Server permission.

Toggle a channel to send all level up messages to.
User **MUST** have the Manage Server permission.

Request care_packages to be sent to the specified channel.
Server **MUST** have atleast 5 active players.
User **MUST** have the Manage Server permission.
Changes your status in the profile command. Supports Discord unicode emoji!
options: `status` - Status to set in the profile command.

description:
Stop airdrops from being sent to the server.
User **MUST** have the Manage Server permission.

Removes the level channel from the server, will cause the bot to default back to replying when users level up.
User **MUST** have the Manage Server permission.

Stops the bot from logging all kills in the server.
User **MUST** have the Manage Server permission.

Toggle the server to only support random attacks with the use command.
User **MUST** have the Manage Server permission.
Sends a link to invite the bot.
Start a server jackpot that lasts 2 minutes! Other players can join the jackpot with the join command. The more you put into the pot, the higher your chance of winning it all.
options: `amount` - Amount of money to put in the pot.

description: Play a game of blackjack. Type hit to draw a random card from the deck or type stand to stop drawing cards and see if the dealer gets closer to 21 than you. Whoever gets closer to 21 without going over, wins!
options: `amount` - Amount of money to bet.

description: View what an item can craft and what it recycles from.
options: `item` - Item to search.

description: View your current power.
The base command for all clan commands. For a detailed look at all the clan commands and how clans work check out: https://github.com/blobfysh/Lootcord/wiki/Clans
usage: clan <command>` - Not specifying a command will default to the `info` command.
